The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are taking in an area with radiation with them. Just after a while, the miners discover the danger themselves. It's up to Frank (John Saxon), the experience older miner to put a plan to save every one into action.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film.
